values: after succeeding spectacularly on my quest of doing absolutely nothing productive with my life, i decided to enjoy a succulent late afternoon snack of oreos and milk.  much to my delight, i discovered that on the oreo package, oreos are subtitled "chocolate sandwich cookies".  obviously my next thought was....CHOCOLATE SANDWICHES?!  DELICIOUS AND NUTRITIOUS?!  needless to say, i patted myself on the back to congratulate my own genius.

sigh.  so i thought i was going to be good and make a change with school and crap.  i was doing well.  i was actually ahead in classes which was weird.  but then i got all depressed, partly cause of the hurricanes, partly because i have yet to take my medicine for the past 5 days.  so now im not doing anything.  and i have a paper due in 10 hours.  i have written 4 sentences.  neat.  i guess i overestimated myself.  woo.  i really am worthless.  

in other news, to second katie, RITA, HURRICANES ARE SO FIVE MINUTES AGO.

HOLY SHIT!!!  I JUST DISCOVERED THAT I HAVE GAMES ON THIS COMPUTER!!!  my dad usually deletes all the games cause he thinks ill waste time.  which is quite true.  my dad is smarter than he appears.  sometimes.  but now, i have solitaire and freecell and spider solitaire and minesweeper.  wow.  my life just got so much better. 

...i might be forced to stick a spork in my eye.

hi friends.  i just remembered that i have a livejournal because shaney was like DO YOU WANT TO BE LIVEJOURNAL FRIENDS AND I WAS ALL YES I DO WANT TO PINCH YOUR LOVE HANDLES.

so yes, in case you were worried, because i know you lose sleep over me every night, i am safe, at my house, bored out of my mind, growing my stomach fat.   i like how it rolls over my waistband.  i wish my fat could talk.  i bet it would be funny.  

um.  i have to switch computers.  my dads stomach fat would nag.  a lot.  and now be able to speak english.

"This is how I relax and maintain my composure. Every now and then, you want to kill somebody." -- Buffalo Bills Willis McGahee on Halo 2. (courtesy of joe cialone, snr 05, baseball capt.) picture this.... senario 1- its prom night. youve taken forever to get ready. weeks of planning. you meet your date. you take awkward pictures with your parents. it is ridicously frustrating. you then proceed to the restaurant where you have to wait forever to be seated. you dont want to order too much, cause you dont want to feel sick afterwards. so you order a salad. and are hungry for the rest of the night. small talk isnt working. and you cant go to the bathroom again, you just went five minutes ago. besides, what the fuck are you supposed to do with all those forks? youre just eating a salad. you hate lettuce anyway. senario 2- its prom nightr. youve taken forever to get ready. weeks of planning. you meet your date. or you dont, whatever, its not like you have to have a date, GOD BACK OFF. you smile pretty for the camera but its alright cause youre in a good mood, and the pictures turn out great. you proceed to the humble abode of a friend. the door opens and the sound of gunshots, laughter, and "SARS STOP SCREEN PEEKING" graces your ears. someone hands you a piece of pizza and points you in the direction of the queso. you are in heaven. after a couple hours of chillaxing and halo, you proceed to prom and have a blast. you are neither too full (cause you burned it all playing prisoner rockets, duh) or too hungry (cause that queso was damn good). and you dont have lettuce stuck in your teeth. a difficult choice we know, but joe and i have confidence you will make the right decision.
oh man i love cutting my toenails.  that is all.

instead of doing anything of merit, i made icons. of course, because i have a free acount, i am only allowed to have 3. as such, i have unleashed them on the public. feel free to take if such is your preference. come one now, i know everybody is a kershena fan. and with just two clicks, you can have her for your very own! the text reads "sign language. translation? je ne sais pas." for tony fanclub members only. shame. my antidrug. billy joel in all his psychedelic glory. homage to the hottest literary character of all time. i realize that its actually i picture of hugh dancy. but you know, dancy...darcy. meant to be, truly.

yes ok i am officially obsessed with this boy.  why is he so cool and surprisingly talented?  also, he conditions.  when asked why is hair is so incredibley soft and bouncy, he replied, in debonair fashion, "i condition".  

also, i will be randomly taking pictures of yall at school and im thinking i will focus on one person a day so be prepared.  i will of course pick the most attractive looking person to focus on so if i dont pick you, i might think youre ugly.  not really.  kind of.

also, the most action ive gotten in 10 years was from john preston backstage when i asked him to give me some sugah and he jumped up and smooched me on the cheek. i think im going to kill myself now.  except not really, because i am strangely infatuated with mr. jp. (haha get it? like mr. jt? i am clever. and pathetic.)

also, yes collin, i am saying also on purpose, in reference to john, hi john.

also, the play is going along well and by well i mean the dress rehearsal is in two days and we havent blocked the last scene. yes.

i think i will force some sugah out of judd fry before the end of this production.  also, i want to be a saloon girl.  yeah, hows that going for you stephen?  enjoying yourself?

and, FRIEND ME SEVAN. 

bye.

so. if youre reading this you should probably sit down because...wait for it...i have decided...to let people touch me. i know. yes that does originally sound sexesque but in candicespeak touch really means get within a three foot radius of me without being verbally abused.  but yes.  i am going to try and not flinch when people try and hug me and become a generally more accessible person.  actually typing this is making me physically uncomfortable so im not sure how well this new plan will work. but i want someone to cuddle me dammit. except not really. because i hate people who cuddle. 
moving on. 
you make me wanna lala in the kitchen on the floor im a french maid when you answer at your door im like an alley cat lick your milk up off the floor
ashlee is whom i aspire to be.

so. im updating. rather monumental, really.
nothing has happened since i last updated which was about 37 months ago.
but also, you can now download linux on livejournal, kind of amusing. thats right, the undergroud is becoming mainstream and techie elitists will have to find something else. hah.
did you know that the christmas stuff they put up in farrish commons doesnt really smell all tree-y? there is a SPRAY that makes them smell. dissapointing. but we do have poker to poke the fire with.  chase and i discovered that we dont in fact know how to make a fire and the mother at the mothers desk had to show us. but we're good at poking. which is alltogether unsurprising. 
my wireless internet finally works which means i can stop stealing my neighboor's connection.  im getting kind of nostaglic. maybe ill send them a virtual fruit basket with those cute little mini muffins that taste like crap. 
also i really want a nap buddy.  maybe ill put out an add.

wanted: nap buddy
requirements-
must smell good
fluffy hair is a big plus(as well as glasses, the rectangle kind with a thin wire rim)
soft pyjama bottoms(breathable cotton is preferred)
one long sleeved cotton shirt with slightly too long sleeves
one snug cotton short sleeved shirt(well worn is the best)
minty fresh breath

yes, a nap buddy is someone who you nap with.  picture it, a rainy afternoon napping with a good smelling soft person. wooooo. andthenmaybesex.

okbye.

also, does anyone want a gmail invite?

p.s. leslie wont have sex in her bed.

morning was spectacular as per usual. got to get up at 6 to sing. which was amazing. teeth are sparkly fresh thanks to crest vivid white toothpaste (refreshing minty taste!) meredith attempted to beguile me with her innocent ways. meanwhile, nisha secretly checks out her ass. then she raped her and left her in despair. math homework has no emotions nisha. you cant just use people like that. french was simply titilating, as usual. truly, sometimes i cant even stand it. french=sex in a box. french people probably have really sweaty sex. thats kind of a disgusting thought. heh. cute. megan strikes a pose after the orgasm that was francais. shes just so aroused. french class left her high and dry. "like an oven" courtesy of mr. jt chase attempts to be "badass". i dunno. hes wearing an oxford. i dont know how badass you can be in a oxford. hes got nice hair though. collin had hotdogs for lunch. yummy. shes either wafting or shes caught a wiff of collins hotdog. either way. its a hot look. its katie. teeth still impeccably shiny. little did we know, in just a few hours this conversation would happen. me: hey collin, UUUUUUUUGGGHHHH collin: UUUUUUUUGGGGHHHAAAAAAAA me: UGH! collin: UGGGGH UGGGGHHHH UGGGGHHHH UGHHHHH UGGGGHHH UGGGGGHHH. everyone else: ... sirignano poses for a glamour shot. glorious. p.s. mark is still going to marry me. rejoicing all around.

is the name of my answering machine. he english. well as english as an answering machine can be anyway. you should all pay him a visit and leave a message. he gets rather bored. and really, what do the english do when theyre bored? they probably read the newspaper in their bathrobes and have crumpets or somesuch. sigh. wilfreds already pretty rotund. he doesnt need anymore crumpets. although i hear tea has certain antioxidants that can help with ones health. but wilfreds a machine. who cares.

in other news, there is still nothing new going on with my life. surprising, i know.
crazy doctor appointment today.  this is what he diagnosed. i am depressed because of the high expectations i set for myself and the work load the school gives me. he is probably the smartest, most intuitive man ive ever met. 

bonasso wants us to play basketball with him after kantorei practice.  let me rephrase that. bonasso wants the people in kantorei to play basketball. with him. to which i say: the people in choir are probably the most athletic specimens of the st johns race. second only to db8rz. and scotty b is the ringleader of them all.
p.s. he told us to bring our "basketball shoes. boys AND girls!" i am filled with anticipation and glee. 

yam.

i sometimes joke about death a lot but things like this make me realize that death isnt funny at all. it hasnt even sunk in yet that theyre gone. i didnt even know them, maybe spoken to them a few times, but it doesnt matter, because theyre gone. and no one can do anything. i hate that all we can do is sit around and think about how theyre dead. no matter how much you hope or pray and cry, thats it. and theres nothing you can do about the pain their families and friends are feeling.  no words can change what happens, nothing can bring them back, and thats the only thing that will stop the pain.  i feel like i cant even breath and i want to throw up just thinking about it, but i cant even cry. because i dont want to believe its true. i wish i could take all the pain away from their parents and younger siblings and store it up inside myself because they dont deserve it and because i want it. maybe all the collected pain will overwhelm me and i wont be able to feel anything.  i want to take it away from them but i cant because its not something you can take.  its not something tangible, something limited.  its an all encompassing feeling that stops everything, everything except for the slow tick of the clock, every second that passes is a second more that they arent here. i know it wont get better in a few weeks or in a month. it will takes years and even then, it will come back in sudden waves and there will be an emptiness and youll gasp for breath and think of fond memories, but its like theyre so far away. like they only ever existed in a dream.  so i ask that you dont forget them and keep your families in your thoughts. im not sure what good praying will do, but if it helps their families, then ill do it anyway.  and to all of my friends, i really dont know what id do without you.  i know i usually act really insensitive and distant, but you are the most amazing people i know and if i didnt have you guys i wouldnt know how to function.  because when im completely unable to function, youre always there, even in my most irritating moods.  because without you, it wouldnt be worth it because i wouldnt have anyone to sit with in silence and just be.  i wouldnt have anywhere to go. because you guys make up my world i want you to remember that.  even when im yelling at you for being stupid and i mean it.  because underneath all of that, i think youre beautiful.
and this is young, slightly molested, in need of sirius to fuck him. or possibly, just fucked my sirius, although that wouldnt explain the creepy old man behind him.
=remus. yes. no talking. just appreciate.

so last night megan, nisha, leslie, and i went to colin's house for some innocent viewing of dirty dancing: havana nights. little did we know, after megan ditched us for her boyfriend, we engaged in click on pictures for explanations/excuses

hello friends.

my nose has an itch.

because its itchy.

but ive scratched it. all is well.

im afraid this is going to be a ridiculously useless entry even though it should be a good one since i havent updated in 763 years. exactly.

just got back from maui where everything is beautiful and it makes you feel guitly about being mad because really whats the point.  many attractive people who were tanned to perfection (the type who work out and are on no carb diets of course-this doesnt make them any less hot by the way).  got followed by 4 conspicously inebriated guys who told me "aloha" over and over, then realized that it was probably the only word they knew.  finally lost them by turning abruptly and as they had lost their finer motor skills to alcohol, i was safe.

also got stalked by some guy who went to georgetown. he had glasses. hee. unfortunately, found out i was in highschool and awkwardness ensued.

leslie is now mad at me for not inviting her to go with me.  most likely her ovaries are going through testosterone withdrawal. shrivelled ovaries are never good. i expect side effects might occur. 

read field hockey workout plan which caroline said was "really not that bad".  have decided that caroline is probably a masochist. its always the ones you dont expect isnt it.

i wonder what human leather would look like.  different skin colors would be differently priced. commercial racism. pleasant thought.  almost as pleasant as human leather. 

bye.

he was wearing a tie today and was looking quite suave with his violin. i may be a freak. 

math is fun when you arent doing math.

i am updating livejournal! obviously. stoopid.

sameer just walked by. he said hey candice after i said hey sameer. but it wasnt hey sameer meaning hi sameer whats up because i hate the phrase whats up because nothing is ever up so why do people even bother asking. no, it was hey! sameer! look, im writing about you in my livejournal. the two were differentiated (haha get it because im in math right now) by the inflection in my voice. CRAAAAZZZZYYYYY.

it saddens me that mark is scared of me. what kind of marriage is that?


class is over. 

i have accomplished-

it keeps dialin and redialin and i go take a shower and i come out and its STILL DIALIN!

lezzles, i dont think you can ask someone to ask you to your prom. also, might i suggest a black clutch?  simple yet STILL A FUCKING PURSE THAT YOU WONT NEED TILL MAY. ahem. pink is neat.

wheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! ...plop. ow...

in other news, i would like to offer my condolences in advance to the family of my murder victim. 

ta.

nothing to say about my personal life either because one can not write about nonexistant things unless they are quite fantastical in which case i could talk about my two boyfriends that are fighting over me because i am just too desirable for words. theres a third guy i fuck on the side who is actually the hottest of all three but hes otherwise engaged with a certain floppy haired intellectual and really, who can compete with him?

please let me tell you every single thing that happened the entire fucking day because im sure that every would LOVE to know.
i woke up. i breathed. i breathed again. i walked to the sink. picked up my tooth brush. with my right hand. turned on the faucet. after switching the toothbrush into my left hand. wet the toothbrush. said "oh my fucking god i fucking hate school. aaaaaah. suck it." proceeded to brush my teeth after squeezing toothpaste onto the toothbrush. then i washed my face. and dried it. then i undressed. and dressed again. and then i went to the car. and went to school. and then i went to all of the same classes that i go t every single school day because that is what i do every single fucking day. and there is never anything different. i took a test. and then i got it back. oh no bad grade. ate lunch with the same people. AND THEN I DID IT ALL OVER AGAIN AND ARENT YOU HAPPY THAT I MADE A WHOLE ENTIRE ENTRY ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED TO ME TODAY BECAUSE DIDNT YOU REALLY WANT TO KNOW YAY THIS IS THE BEST JOURNAL EVER. (*&%$(*%$%$(%@(&*%@(&%@*&%#)@#%)@#%)(%(#()*&#(*&)%@*&_)$*$(*&_$@^)*&$@%.

Pregnant Love

Candice finished packing. Ever since Hot guy, her own true love, had been lost at sea, Candice had been sunny.

There was nothing left for her anymore, nothing caressed her, all was silky. So today, Valentine's Day, she was going under a tree to become a fuzzy spindle.

Just then, there was a piercing knock at the door. Candice opened it and stood there agonizingly for a moment, before falling to the floor in a swoon and bruising her neck.

When Candice came to, Hot guy was holding her left ass cheek and looking limpid. "My love," Hot guy said spastically, "I'm sorry for the HUGE shock. I've been shipwrecked on a neato island for the last ten years, living like winter in the summertime. I was only rescued last week." He paused. "I lost my eyelash in the wreck. Can you still love me?"

Candice could hardly believe her Hot guy had returned. "I will always love you, eyelash or no eyelash. Besides, you can cover it up with a bandana." 

They embraced warmly and vowed to never be parted again.

on a similar tangent
if i have been somewhat "cold" or snippy to you as of late, it is probably due to one or both of the following reasons

1. i have recently discovered that i have failed in every aspect of my life and am surrounded by a group of annoyingly perpetual nonfailers.  as i do not cope well with failure, surprising as it may seem, i might be slightly put out, a little depressed, and maybe half a pinch bitter.  therefore, although thats not really a good excuse for being mean, dont take it personally.  rather, take it as a compliment that i do not view you as a fellow failure.  of course, fellow failures may also be slighted in the process as my bitterness is pretty much equal opportunity.

2. you are annoying and i do not like you.

good day.

except if you have a significant other. then youre not invited. because were jealous and bitter.
in honor of valentines day, maggi, alex, and i have established the anti-valentines day (february the 13th-a friday to be exact).  it is the antithesis of all that is valentines day. do not be mistaken, this is not hate day. because valentines day isnt really about love is it?  its about being lovey, feeling wanted, and getting some. so i present a challenge.  this unprecedented day remains unnamed and as all great things need a name, we feel that this day deserves no less.  so everyone out there who feels lonely, resentful, or is just in need of a hug, join us in this pathetic celebration of what could be!  put your name down in history as the one who named the antivalentines day. to quote shakespeare and maggi, "a rose by any other name would smell as sweet" but is that really true. no! of course not! what if brad pitts name was melvin?  what if your name was melvin? so rack your bitter yet witty brains and come up with a name, and singles everywhere would rejoice.  please leave the name in a comment along with your name and why you think your name (for the day) is best.

i just baked cookies. they are chocolate chip. i slightly underbaked them so they are warm and gooey in the middle, with a slightly grainy texture from the sugar.  quite good. and they are about 1 1/2 cm thick so there is just enough room to bite into but no enough so that it feels too doughy. they are perfect. 
in other news, who ever made this comment-
"yeah seriously, about the kissing thing. i wonder what made the person who invented kissing think of lips and tongues. think about what it would be like if he had made kissing like touching knee caps with someone else. that would be weird. "
deserves a prize. just take a moment to picture it in your head.  staring deeping into each others eyes, overcome with passion, intertwined in a passionat er- kneelock?  and then instead of getting hickeys youd just get bruises on your knees. hmmm. and the position would be awkward. do you stand up? lie down? you certainly cant kneel, at least not for that purpose. and its not like you have to come up for air. you just sort of stand there, leaning back so your faces dont get in the way, rubbing knees.  wow.  sexy.
